name: Crunchy Caramel Pumpkin Bites
preparation: In a 9” x 13” baking dish, make cheesecake according to package directions. Cool, and cut into 2-bite squares.
While cheesecake cools, in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, combine sauce ingredients. Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat for 3 minutes.
Fold sauce into popcorn. Once cooled, crunch up into slightly smaller pieces. Sprinkle on top of the cheesecake squares, and serve.
tips: Gently press caramel popcorn into the cheesecake, so it adheres better.
For crunchier popcorn, spread carmelized popcorn on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner, and toast for 10 minutes in a 300° F (150° C) oven.

products.name: Pumpkin Cheesecake (Pack of 2)
summary: Put your PSL down for a moment and whip up a delectable Pumpkin Cheesecake packed with all the fall flavours! This dessert will be the talk of every Thanksgiving dinner, festive feast, and family dinner night and the amazing part is, it’s so easy to make! Just mix the ingredients, pour the blend into a pie crust (use premade shells to keep things easy), pop it in the oven, and enjoy that nice pumpkin spice.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
